definition: لقط laqaṭa u (laqṭ) to gather, collect, pick up from the ground, glean (هـ s.th.) II = I V to gather, glean (هـ s.th.); to pick up (هـ s.th., also, e.g., with the ear) VIII = I; to receive (هـ radio waves, a radio message; to take (هـ a picture; phot.) │ التقط صورة (ṣūra) to make a picture لقط laqaṭ that which ill picked up or gathered, leftovers, gleanings
